test-method.name: TC_001_CreateEmp_POST_Request
test-method.description: Create a new record in the database

exception.message:
Error executing HTTP request: Don't know how to encode { "name": "Vignesh", "salary": "123", "age": "23" } as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
